result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on November 7, 2022 at 11:30 am.

1:43 PM Defendant Patrick A. Bauer in court with Attorney Adam P Nero in court for Patrick A. Bauer.  Attorney Jon D. Seifert appeared by phone for State of Wisconsin. Mr. Nero requests PH, WTL.  Court finds Mr. Bauer KVI and on advise of counsel WTL for PH.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Adjustment Number: 22A 003664,
Payable Number: 35948,
Receipt Number: 22R 001098,
Amount: $20.00

12:48 PM Defendant Patrick A. Bauer appeared without counsel by video from the Pepin County Jail.  Attorney Jon D. Seifert appeared by phone for State of Wisconsin. Court advised defendant of charges in criminal complaint alleging as a 4th offense/max. penalties and rights. Mr. Seifert addresses bond.  Asks for $1000 signature bond; no possession or consumption of alcohol; no entrance into bars or taverns; no operation of mv without valid license.  Court will allow a signature bond but will require Mr. Bauer to be on alcohol monitor and pay $275 deposit before released for the first 2 weeks of the monitor and continue paying until your case is resolved.  The COC can put you in touch with the CJS program who will do the monitoring on the sober link device and pay the deposit at that time.  Court encourages Mr. Bauer to contact the SPD or can hire his own attorney.  If he doesn't qualify for SPD, Court would consider appointing an attorney and he would be put on pp.  Addt'l conditions of release:  no possession or consumption of alcohol; no entrance into bars or taverns; no possession or consumption of controlled substance without a physician's prescription; no operation of mv without a valid license and insurance.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
